channel.title: mysql on Halface
channel.description: Recent content in mysql on Halface

item.title: Mysql主主互备
item.description: mysql主主互备 1 2 3 实验环境： hjj2017110109 192.168.160.80 hjj2017110109_node2 192.168.160.81 修改第一节点的/etc/my.cnf配置文件 添加如下 1 2 3 4 5 6 server_id = 1 log-bin = mysql-bin relay-log = mysql-relay-bin replicate-wild-ignore-table=mysql.% #指定不需要复

item.title: mysql高可用Amoeba读写分离
item.description:
Mysql Amoeba读写分离

环境：192.168.160.133 hjj2017110109

192.168.160.134 slave-node

192.168.160.135 amoeba-node

首先hjj2017110109与slave节点做成主从复制
